title: Kansas City Chiefs
description: Get your football fanatic readers into the action. Inside the NFL uses chronological narratives to tell the beginnings of the Kansas City Chiefs, relate the greatest and lowest moments of the team, introduce the best players and coaches, and share other fun facts that help round out Chiefs' history. Mini-biographies, sidebars, fun facts, fantastic quotes, and full-color, action-packed photographs will bring the NFL to your library.
author: Brian Lester
